sen.j: 仁治3年（1242年）1月の後嵯峨天皇の即位を受けて、6月に急遽18歳にして同天皇の女御となり、その2ヵ月後に中宮に冊立された。
sen.e: Came to the throne of the Emperor Gosaga on January 1242, she was appointed to his Nyogo (imperial consort) on very short notice as an 18 year old, and was promoted to Chugu two months after.

sen.e: Four years later, due to the Emperor Gosaga giving the throne to Emperor Gofukakusa (who Kitsushi gave birth to), she received the imperial proclamation for Ingo and was given the title "Omiyain" in June 1246.
